DOC.brief_summary: This observational study investigate tolerability efficacy Tarceva ( erlotinib ) daily clinical practice routine condition patient locally advance metastatic non small cell lung cancer . Data collect approximately 12 month .
DOC.brief_title: An Observational Study Tarceva ( Erlotinib ) Routine Practice For First Line Maintenance Therapy Patients With Non Small Cell Lung Cancer
DOC.criteria: Adult patient locally advance metastatic nonsmall cell lung cancer ( stage IIIb IV ) stable disease 4 cycle standard platinumbased firstline chemotherapy Not willing able sign write informed consent form
